characters.name: Governor
characters.characterDescription: Governor Arnold Capaldi has been running the small town of Amberlee for 3 years. He is known for his promiscuity and poor treatment of his employees.

characters.name: Wife
characters.characterDescription: Governor Arnold's wife, Lynda is a kind, beautiful woman. She trained as a doctor but left a promising career to support her husband in his long campaigns.

characters.name: Brother
characters.characterDescription: Thomas Capaldi, Governor Arnold's brother, is hot-headed and sincere but his efforts always seem to go un-noticed

characters.name: Maid
characters.characterDescription: Their maid Marta has been working with the Capaldi's for about 8 years now. She loves gossip, but doesn't everyone?

characters.name: Secretary
characters.characterDescription: Governor Arnold's secratary Julia loves attention. She knows a little too much about the Governor than his wife Lynda would like.
